compact.$description: Compact devices (<375px) - iPhone SE, small Android. Use max-width: 374px for compact styles.

medium.$description: Medium devices (375-414px) - iPhone 14, Pixel. Use min-width: 375px, max-width: 414px for medium styles.

large.$description: Large devices (>414px) - iPhone Pro Max, tablets. Use min-width: 415px for large styles.
